name: LollipopShow
0:
”Alexa, show the nursery camera”
”Alexa, show the nursery”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Lollipop Show and Alexa, you can now access your Lollipop Baby Camera using voice commands!

You can use Lollipop Show to view the live view from your Lollipop Baby Camera, play music, and even talk to your baby! This skill integrates your Lollipop Baby Camera into smart home automation and lets parents monitor kids in a much easier way.

To get started, simply sign up your account on Lollipop App, and add your cameras to the account. Next, enable Lollipop Show and link your Lollipop account. The skill will integrate your cameras with Amazon Alexa allowing you to view them on any Alexa supported video device.

NOTE: Lollipop Show is not a cloud service that directly hosts or provides access to your camera’s audio/video feeds but rather an integration service. In order to watch the live view of your cameras from Alexa devices, all your cameras and Alexa must be on the same Wi-Fi network. In addition, the firmware of all your cameras must be updated to the latest version to ensure the functions work normally. (Or the version should be later than 2020070300-g70fb75f)

Need more help? Contact our support team at support@lollipop.camera.
